sections.title: What is a Transformer?
sections.content: A transformer is like a smart robot that can read and understand lots of words at once, just like how you can look at a whole picture instead of one piece at a time.

sections.title: How Does It Work?
sections.content: It pays attention to all the words in a sentence, so it knows which words are important, just like how you listen to your teacher in class.

sections.title: Why Is It Special?
sections.content: Transformers can learn really fast and help computers talk, write stories, and even answer questions!
